Function# kext_alloc

macOS 15.0+

```
kern_return_t kext_alloc(vm_offset_t *addr, vm_size_t size, boolean_t fixed);
```

## [See Also](/documentation/kernel/1577598-kext_alloc#see-also)

### [kext](/documentation/kernel/1577598-kext_alloc#kext)

[`kext_alloc_init`](/documentation/kernel/1577599-kext_alloc_init)[`kext_free`](/documentation/kernel/1577600-kext_free)[`kext_request`](/documentation/kernel/1588829-kext_request)[`kextd_ping`](/documentation/kernel/1520989-kextd_ping)[`OSKextCancelRequest`](/documentation/kernel/1508350-oskextcancelrequest)Cancels a pending user-space kext request without invoking the callback.[`OSKextGetCurrentIdentifier`](/documentation/kernel/1508305-oskextgetcurrentidentifier)Returns the CFBundleIdentifier for the calling kext as a C string.[`OSKextGetCurrentLoadTag`](/documentation/kernel/1508336-oskextgetcurrentloadtag)Returns the run-time load tag for the calling kext as an `OSKextLoadTag`.[`OSKextGetCurrentVersionString`](/documentation/kernel/1508326-oskextgetcurrentversionstring)Returns the CFBundleVersion for the calling kext as a C string.[`OSKextGrabPgoData`](/documentation/kernel/1508333-oskextgrabpgodata)[`OSKextLoadKextWithIdentifier`](/documentation/kernel/1508323-oskextloadkextwithidentifier)Request that a kext be loaded.[`OSKextReleaseKextWithLoadTag`](/documentation/kernel/1508339-oskextreleasekextwithloadtag)Release a loaded kext based on its load tag.[`OSKextRequestResource`](/documentation/kernel/1508294-oskextrequestresource)Requests data from a nonlocalized resource file in a kext bundle on disk.[`OSKextResetPgoCounters`](/documentation/kernel/1646298-oskextresetpgocounters)[`OSKextResetPgoCountersLock`](/documentation/kernel/1646299-oskextresetpgocounterslock)[`OSKextResetPgoCountersUnlock`](/documentation/kernel/1646297-oskextresetpgocountersunlock)[`OSKextRetainKextWithLoadTag`](/documentation/kernel/1508272-oskextretainkextwithloadtag)Retain a loaded kext based on its load tag, and enable autounload for that kext.
